{{also|wind}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|wint}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*windaz}}, ultimately from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*h₂wéh₁n̥ts||blowing}}, present participle of {{m|ine-pro|*h₂weh₁-||to blow}}. Compare {{cog|nl|wind}}, {{cog|en|wind}}, {{cog|da|vind}}, {{cog|got|𐍅𐌹𐌽𐌳𐍃}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/vɪnt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Wind.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Wind.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{rhymes|de|ɪnt}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Windes|Winde|gen2=Winds|Windchen}} # [[wind]]; movement of air usually caused by convection or differences of air pressure ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Hyponyms==== * {{l|de|Fahrtwind}} * {{l|de|Fahrwind}} * {{l|de|Gegenwind}} * {{l|de|Rückenwind}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Windsack}} * {{l|de|Windschatten}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|von etwas Wind bekommen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Wind]] ---- ==Low German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|nds|osx|wind}}, from {{inh|nds|gem-pro|*windaz}}, ultimately from {{inh|nds|ine-pro|*h₂wéh₁n̥ts||blowing}}, present participle of {{m|ine-pro|*h₂weh₁-||to blow}}. Compare {{cog|de|Wind}}, {{cog|nl|wind}}, {{cog|en|wind}}, {{cog|da|vind}}, {{cog|got|𐍅𐌹𐌽𐌳𐍃}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nds|/wɪnt/}} ===Noun=== {{nds-noun|m|Winn|pl2=Winnen}} # [[wind]]; movement of air usually caused by convection or differences of air pressure ====Derived terms==== * {{l|nds|Fohrtwind}} * {{l|nds|Fohrwind}} * {{l|nds|Gegenwind}}
